Article.ArticleTitle: Pharmacological trials for long COVID: first light at the end of the tunnel.

AffiliationInfo.Affiliation: Department of Woman and Child Health and Public Health, Fondazione Policlinico Universitario A. Gemelli IRCCS, Rome, Italy.
Centro di Salute Globale, Università Cattolica del Sacro Cuore, Roma, Italy.

MedlineCitation.CoiStatement: Danilo Buonsenso has received a grant from 10.13039/100004319Pfizer to study the long-term burden of Long Covid in Children, and a grant from RocheItalia to study microRNA profile in children with Long Covid. Danilo Buonsenso has partecipated in a Peer-to-Peer educational program on Long Covid sponsored by 10.13039/100004319Pfizer.
